contact.location: Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam

summary: With a multidisciplinary skillset honed over 4+ years in the IT industry, I believe that I can use my experience and skills to contribute to creating high-quality products that can bring financial benefit to your company as well as social benefit. Because I worked in both product company and outsourcing agency and I am also a non-stop learner, I am very confident that I can adapt very quickly with new teammates, company culture and lastest technologies

experience.description: In Designveloper, I worked in both outsourcing and product projects as a full-stack developer. The main technical stack is NodeJS, React JS, React Native, MongoDB, Meteor, GraphQL. I was also the SCRUM Master of the team of 10 members. I also joined the R&D team to research and apply new technology to company
GCALLS LTD., CO is start-up about VOIP products. Besides the main responsibility as Fullstack developer, I also work as a Business Analyst and QC engineer.
